attributes.action: Decriminalise possession and use of psilocybin mushrooms.
attributes.additional_details: To combat the mental health crisis.
attributes.background: Reconsider psilocybin as a class A drug. Enable more research to be done into it’s effects and explore its potential for therapeutic benefit.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign these petitions which calls for similar action:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/745945
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/743563
